availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas Scudder Page (Frankfort, farmer & former asst state auditor )

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, farmer. New York native. Son of John Page and Eliza Harriet Rothwell. Virginia resident in 1802. Married Sophia Western Woolfolk Page. Married Jane Briggs Julian in 1828. Second State Auditor in Franfort in 1850. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 2, p. 54B. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, District 2, p. 7. Find A Grave, "Thomas Scudder Page (1800-1877)," Memorial #79947618, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=page&GSfn=thomas&GSmn=scudder&GSbyrel=all&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=79947618&df=all& (accessed April 10, 2017).
